metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

properties.serializedData:
{"version":"Notebook/1.0","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"## Application Gateway WAF triage workbook
---

This workbook will help you triage Application Gateway WAF violations."},"name":"text - 2"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"63ea93e5-3270-4447-9572-ad9e62095e7b","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"subscription","label":"Subscription","type":6,"isRequired":true,"multiSelect":true,"quote":"'","delimiter":",","value":["/subscriptions/7fb60491-16dc-40e7-8a78-6cfd3cd18d39"],"typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":[],"includeAll":false}},{"id":"12476248-81b7-46af-a9b4-790f93306442","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"workspace","label":"Workspace","type":5,"isRequired":true,"query":"where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| summarize by id, name
| project id","crossComponentResources":["{subscription}"],"value":"/subscriptions/7fb60491-16dc-40e7-8a78-6cfd3cd18d39/resourceGroups/avd-rg-law-core-westeu-01/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/avd-law-core-westeu-01","typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":[]},"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources"},{"id":"f451ddc5-00e3-4fe7-908e-22d0be9ab59c","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"detectionTime","label":"Detection Time","type":4,"isRequired":true,"value":{"durationMs":14400000},"typeSettings":{"selectableValues":[{"durationMs":300000},{"durationMs":900000},{"durationMs":1800000},{"durationMs":3600000},{"durationMs":14400000},{"durationMs":43200000},{"durationMs":86400000},{"durationMs":172800000},{"durationMs":259200000},{"durationMs":604800000},{"durationMs":1209600000},{"durationMs":2419200000},{"durationMs":2592000000},{"durationMs":5184000000},{"durationMs":7776000000}]},"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000}}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"name":"parameters - 2"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AGWFirewallLogs 
| where TimeGenerated {detectionTime}
| extend Id = new_guid()
| project-reorder Id, _ResourceId, Action, InstanceId
| project Id, ResourceId=_ResourceId, Action, InstanceId
| evaluate pivot(Action, count(), ResourceId, InstanceId)","size":1,"title":"Select the scope of the WAF policy","exportedParameters":[{"fieldName":"ResourceId","parameterName":"ResourceId","parameterType":1},{"fieldName":"InstanceId","parameterName":"InstanceId","parameterType":1}],"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{workspace}"],"visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"$gen_group","formatter":13,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":null,"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"ResourceId","formatter":5},{"columnMatch":"Matched","formatter":8,"formatOptions":{"palette":"greenRed"}},{"columnMatch":"Blocked","formatter":8,"formatOptions":{"palette":"greenRed"}}],"rowLimit":500,"hierarchySettings":{"treeType":1,"groupBy":["ResourceId"]}},"tileSettings":{"showBorder":false}},"name":"query-app-gateway-resources"},{"type":11,"content":{"version":"LinkItem/1.0","style":"tabs","links":[{"id":"14e61d36-d59a-405d-8363-ac1aa8a2f491","cellValue":"SelectedTabPage","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Triage by Rule","subTarget":"triage-by-rule","preText":"Triage by Rule","style":"link"},{"id":"93464fc4-d183-4d74-9e06-111c6de081a9","cellValue":"SelectedTabPage","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Triage by URL","subTarget":"triage-by-url","preText":"Triage ","style":"link"}]},"name":"TabNavigation"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AGWFirewallLogs
| where TimeGenerated {detectionTime}
| where _ResourceId == '{ResourceId}' and InstanceId == '{InstanceId}'
| summarize Count = count() by RuleSetType, RuleSetVersion, RuleId, Action, FileDetails
| order by Count desc
| project-reorder Count
| join kind=inner (AGWFirewallLogs | where TimeGenerated {detectionTime} | where _ResourceId == '{ResourceId}' and InstanceId == '{InstanceId}'
                                    | make-series Trend = count() on TimeGenerated from {detectionTime:start} to {detectionTime:end} step (time({detectionTime:seconds} seconds) / 20)  by RuleId
    ) on RuleId
// Since the new logs no longer show parts that could be used to construct exact GitHub URL, we're now just searching for the file in GitHub as the
// next best option.
| project Count, RuleSetType, RuleSetVersion, RuleId, Action, FileDetails, SearchUrl=iif(isempty(FileDetails), '', strcat('https://github.com/search?q=repo%3Acoreruleset%2Fcoreruleset%20path%3A%2F%5Erules%5C%2F%2F%20', FileDetails, '&type=code')), Trend
| extend Id = new_guid()","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Rules that got triggered","exportedParameters":[{"fieldName":"RuleSetVersion","parameterName":"RuleSetVersion"},{"fieldName":"Hostname","parameterName":"Hostname","parameterType":1},{"fieldName":"RuleId","parameterName":"RuleId","parameterType":1}],"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{workspace}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"Count","formatter":8,"formatOptions":{"palette":"greenRed"}},{"columnMatch":"FileDetails","formatter":1},{"columnMatch":"SearchUrl","formatter":7,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":"Url","linkLabel":"","customColumnWidthSetting":"20ch"}},{"columnMatch":"Trend","formatter":10,"formatOptions":{"palette":"yellowOrangeRed"}},{"columnMatch":"Id","formatter":5},{"columnMatch":"TimeGenerated","formatter":5}]},"sortBy":[]},"customWidth":"100","name":"query - violated rules"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AGWFirewallLogs
| where _ResourceId == '{ResourceId}' and RuleId == '{RuleId}' and InstanceId == '{InstanceId}' and RuleSetVersion == '{RuleSetVersion}'
| where TimeGenerated {detectionTime}
| extend splittedhost = split(Hostname, ':')
| extend HostnameNoPort = tostring(splittedhost[0]) //override hostname_s to just contain host; drop the port section
| extend port = tostring(splittedhost[1])
| distinct Hostname, HostnameNoPort","size":0,"title":"Hosts Affected","exportedParameters":[{"fieldName":"Hostname","parameterName":"Hostname"},{"fieldName":"HostnameNoPort","parameterName":"HostnameNoPort","parameterType":1}],"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{workspace}"],"visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"hostname_s_noport","formatter":5}]}},"customWidth":"15","showPin":true,"name":"Affected Hosts"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AGWFirewallLogs
| where TimeGenerated {detectionTime}
| where _ResourceId == '{ResourceId}' and InstanceId == '{InstanceId}' and RuleId == '{RuleId}'
| where Hostname == '{Hostname}'
| project-reorder Hostname, TransactionId
| join kind=inner (AGWAccessLogs | where TimeGenerated {detectionTime}) on TransactionId
| project Host, HttpMethod, OriginalRequestUriWithArgs=RequestUri, RequestUri=RequestUri1
| distinct Host, HttpMethod, RequestUri, OriginalRequestUriWithArgs
| order by Host, RequestUri, HttpMethod, OriginalRequestUriWithArgs
| extend id = new_guid()","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Hosts and urls impacted by selected rule","exportedParameters":[{"fieldName":"HttpMethod","parameterName":"Method","parameterType":1},{"fieldName":"OriginalRequestUriWithArgs","parameterName":"FullUri","parameterType":1},{"fieldName":"RequestUri","parameterName":"RequestUri","parameterType":1}],"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{workspace}"],"visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"RequestUri","formatter":5},{"columnMatch":"id","formatter":5}],"rowLimit":1000,"hierarchySettings":{"treeType":1,"groupBy":["RequestUri"],"expandTopLevel":true,"finalBy":"requestUri_s"}}},"customWidth":"60","name":"affected urls"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AGWFirewallLogs
| where _ResourceId == '{ResourceId}' and InstanceId == '{InstanceId}'
| where TimeGenerated {detectionTime}
| distinct TransactionId
| join kind=inner (AGWAccessLogs | where TimeGenerated {detectionTime}) 
  on TransactionId
| where OriginalHost == '{HostnameNoPort}' and HttpMethod == '{Method}' and RequestUri == ```{RequestUri}``` and OriginalRequestUriWithArgs == ```{FullUri}```
| project TransactionId
| extend access_log = strcat("AGWAccessLogs | where TimeGenerated {detectionTime} | where TransactionId == \"", TransactionId, "\"")
| extend firewall_log = strcat("AGWFirewallLogs | where TimeGenerated {detectionTime} | where TransactionId == \"", TransactionId, "\"")","size":0,"title":"Requests on selected host and url","exportFieldName":"TransactionId","exportParameterName":"TransactionId","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{workspace}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"transactionId_g","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{"customColumnWidthSetting":"40%"}},{"columnMatch":"access_log","formatter":7,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":"OpenBlade","linkLabel":"Find in Access Log","linkIsContextBlade":true,"bladeOpenContext":{"bladeName":"LogsBlade","extensionName":"Microsoft_Azure_Monitoring_Logs","bladeParameters":[{"name":"resourceId","source":"parameter","value":"workspace"},{"name":"source","source":"static","value":"Microsoft_Azure_Monitoring_Logs/LogsBlade"},{"name":"query","source":"cell","value":""}]}}},{"columnMatch":"firewall_log","formatter":7,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":"OpenBlade","linkLabel":"Find in Firewall Log","linkIsContextBlade":true,"bladeOpenContext":{"bladeName":"LogsBlade","extensionName":"Microsoft_Azure_Monitoring_Logs","bladeParameters":[{"name":"resourceId","source":"parameter","value":"workspace"},{"name":"source","source":"static","value":"Microsoft_Azure_Monitoring_Logs/LogsBlade"},{"name":"query","source":"cell","value":""}]}}}]}},"customWidth":"25","name":"ImpactedRequestsFromSelectedUri"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AGWFirewallLogs
| where TransactionId == '{TransactionId}'
| extend Id = new_guid()
| project-reorder Id, Action, RuleSetType, RuleSetVersion, RuleId, Message, Hostname, RequestUri, DetailedMessage, DetailedData, FileDetails, LineDetails, TransactionId
| project Action, RuleId, Message, DetailedMessage, DetailedData, SearchUrl=iif(isempty(FileDetails), '', strcat('https://github.com/search?q=repo%3Acoreruleset%2Fcoreruleset%20path%3A%2F%5Erules%5C%2F%2F%20', FileDetails, '&type=code')), TimeGenerated","size":0,"title":"Rules that got triggered for selected request","exportedParameters":[{"fieldName":"TransactionId","parameterName":"TransactionId"},{"fieldName":"Message","parameterName":"message","parameterType":1},{"fieldName":"DetailedMessage","parameterName":"details","parameterType":1},{"fieldName":"DetailedData","parameterName":"matcheddata","parameterType":1}],"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{workspace}"],"visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"SearchUrl","formatter":7,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":"Url","linkLabel":""}}],"labelSettings":[{"columnId":"Message","label":"message"},{"columnId":"TimeGenerated","label":"time generated"}]}},"name":"TriggeredRules"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"## Selection Summary:

You were looking for example requests which were impacted by WAF rule with id: **{RuleId}**.  

More information on the selected rule which impacted this url, can be found on the [Core Rule Set Project](https://coreruleset.org/) GitHub page

On the host with name "*{Hostname}*" and url "*{FullUri}*" you have found an HTTP request, impacted by this rule, with transaction id equal to *{TransactionId}*.  

More info on this request and the selected rule:
- Message: {message}
- Details: {details}
- Matched Data: {matcheddata}"},"name":"text - 7"}],"exportParameters":true},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"SelectedTabPage","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"triage-by-rule"},"name":"Triage by rule"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AGWAccessLogs
| where _ResourceId == '{ResourceId}' and InstanceId == '{InstanceId}'
| where TimeGenerated {detectionTime}
| distinct Host
| project Hostname=Host","size":0,"title":"Hostnames with entries in Firewall Log","exportFieldName":"Hostname","exportParameterName":"Hostname","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{workspace}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"hostname_s","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{"customColumnWidthSetting":"100%"}}]},"sortBy":[]},"customWidth":"10","name":"Hostnames with entries in Firewall Log"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AGWFirewallLogs
| where _ResourceId == '{ResourceId}' and InstanceId == '{InstanceId}'
| where Hostname == '{Hostname}'
| where TimeGenerated {detectionTime}
| join kind=inner (AGWAccessLogs | where _ResourceId == '{ResourceId}' and InstanceId == '{InstanceId}')
  on TransactionId
| distinct  RequestUri, HttpMethod, OriginalRequestUriWithArgs, HttpStatus
| extend Id = new_guid()
","size":0,"title":"Paths which have triggered firewall rules","exportedParameters":[{"fieldName":"RequestUri","parameterName":"RequestUri"},{"fieldName":"OriginalRequestUriWithArgs","parameterName":"RequestUriWithArgs","parameterType":1},{"fieldName":"HttpMethod","parameterName":"HttpMethod","parameterType":1},{"fieldName":"HttpStatus","parameterName":"HttpStatus","parameterType":1},{"parameterType":1}],"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{workspace}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"Id","formatter":5},{"columnMatch":"encodedRequestUriWithArgs","formatter":5}],"filter":true,"hierarchySettings":{"treeType":1,"groupBy":["RequestUri","HttpMethod"],"finalBy":"httpStatus_d1"}},"sortBy":[]},"customWidth":"60","name":"Paths which have triggered firewall rules"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AGWFirewallLogs
| where _ResourceId == '{ResourceId}' and InstanceId == '{InstanceId}'
| where Hostname == '{Hostname}'
| where TimeGenerated {detectionTime}
| join kind=inner (AGWAccessLogs | where _ResourceId == '{ResourceId}')
  on TransactionId
| where OriginalRequestUriWithArgs == ```{RequestUriWithArgs}``` and HttpMethod == '{HttpMethod}' and HttpStatus == '{HttpStatus}'
| distinct TransactionId
| extend access_log = strcat("AGWAccessLogs | where TimeGenerated {detectionTime} | where TransactionId == \"", TransactionId, "\"")
| extend firewall_log = strcat("AGWFirewallLogs | where TimeGenerated {detectionTime} | where TransactionId == \"", TransactionId, "\"")","size":0,"title":"Requests on selected host and url","exportFieldName":"TransactionId","exportParameterName":"TransactionId","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{workspace}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"access_log","formatter":7,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":"OpenBlade","linkLabel":"Find in Access Log","linkIsContextBlade":true,"bladeOpenContext":{"bladeName":"LogsBlade","extensionName":"Microsoft_Azure_Monitoring_Logs","bladeParameters":[{"name":"resourceId","source":"parameter","value":"workspace"},{"name":"source","source":"static","value":"Microsoft_Azure_Monitoring_Logs/LogsBlade"},{"name":"query","source":"cell","value":""}]}}},{"columnMatch":"firewall_log","formatter":7,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":"OpenBlade","linkLabel":"Find in Firewall Log","linkIsContextBlade":true,"bladeOpenContext":{"bladeName":"LogsBlade","extensionName":"Microsoft_Azure_Monitoring_Logs","bladeParameters":[{"name":"resourceId","source":"parameter","value":"workspace"},{"name":"source","source":"static","value":"Microsoft_Azure_Monitoring_Logs/LogsBlade"},{"name":"query","source":"cell","value":""}]}}},{"columnMatch":"TransactionId","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{"customColumnWidthSetting":"40%"}}]}},"customWidth":"25","name":"query - 3"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AGWFirewallLogs
| where TransactionId == '{TransactionId}'
| extend Id = new_guid()
| project-reorder Id, Action, RuleSetType, RuleSetVersion, RuleId, Message, Hostname, RequestUri, DetailedMessage, DetailedData, FileDetails, LineDetails, TransactionId
| project Action, RuleId, Message, DetailedMessage, DetailedData, SearchUrl=iif(isempty(FileDetails), '', strcat('https://github.com/search?q=repo%3Acoreruleset%2Fcoreruleset%20path%3A%2F%5Erules%5C%2F%2F%20', FileDetails, '&type=code')), TimeGenerated, RuleSetType
","size":0,"title":"Rules that got triggered for selected request","exportedParameters":[{"fieldName":"TransactionId","parameterName":"TransactionId"},{"fieldName":"Message","parameterName":"message","parameterType":1},{"fieldName":"DetailedMessage","parameterName":"details","parameterType":1},{"fieldName":"DetailedData","parameterName":"matcheddata","parameterType":1}],"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{workspace}"],"visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"SearchUrl","formatter":7,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":"Url","linkLabel":""}},{"columnMatch":"statusFromAction","formatter":5,"numberFormat":{"unit":0,"options":{"style":"decimal"}}}],"labelSettings":[{"columnId":"Message","label":"message"},{"columnId":"TimeGenerated","label":"time generated"}]}},"name":"TriggeredRules - By Url"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"## Selection Summary:

You were looking for requests which triggered a WAF rule on url: _{RequestUri}_.  
You have found an HTTP request, impacted by this rule, with transaction id equal to *{TransactionId}*.  

More information on the selected rule which impacted this url, can be found on the [Core Rule Set Project](https://coreruleset.org) GitHub page



More info on this request and the selected rule:
- Message: {message}
- Details: {details}
- Matched Data: {matcheddata}"},"name":"text - 7 - Copy"}],"exportParameters":true},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"SelectedTabPage","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"triage-by-url"},"name":"Triage by URL"}],"isLocked":false,"defaultResourceIds":["value::all"]}
